paragraph1: First off, I want to express my deepest and sincere gratitude to each and every one of you. The excitement was indescribable when I received a job offer from Grab (Oct 2021) after numerous rounds of interviews. Accepting this opporunity has been one of the proudest moments in my life. The continuous support and friendship I've experienced here have been amazing, made me enjoying every moment of my time at Grab.
paragraph2: I appreciate the exciting opportunities given during my time here. I was first welcomed with the warmth of broken pipelines, Azure migration, AWS migration and OVO ingestions along with many orphaned datasets ownership. Within a few months, my hiring manager moved on, followed shortly by my new manager and colleagues who left around 3-6 months later. This left me as the only remaining GFG ADW member. However, my current manager, an expert in the data field was able to turn these challenges into opportunities, guiding me and the team to rebuild the entire ADW platform into what we have today. A special thanks also goes to the Caspian team for their unwavering support during this period of transition and platform setup.
paragraph3: I want to let you all know how much I'm going to miss working with you. Our time together wasn't just about work, it was an exciting journey. Leaving behind the friendships and connections we've built makes this decision incredibly tough. Each and every one of you has made this experience truly memorable for me. While I am excited about the new chapter awaiting me, it is bittersweet to say goodbye to a place that has meant so much to me. Please know that I leave with a heavy heart, but with pride in all we've achieved together. For those in India and Indo, do visit/call me when you're at Singapore!
827eaabb74575219c42595c8f9ab7dd5ef889341: Input your Grab's slack handle to view the goodbye messages.
542f765889e86ec6be5aec106936aadf46687249: Firstly, thanks for the abalone (it was my favourite food)!! Your recognition of my efforts in the EDW Auto documentation project further motivated me to strive further in the AI field. I was proud looking at your smile while I was presenting on the stage. Your leadership brought us to where we are today and thanks to the opportunity you've created to facilitate my professional growth and shape me into the person I am today.
0f1f34e6bf874d2c3f6bdb22e21854b29f3de7e2: Without your leadership, EDW wouldn't be what we are today. Though you often describe your concepts as 'simple and basic', but it's the whole new realm of knowledge to me and the team. Since you stationed me in the coding work that I really enjoys, you have given me the empowerment to push my own boundaries and limit to design and implement innovative crazy naive ideas.  The experience of working alongside you, especially during migration, has been incredibly enjoyable.
b4bb286fa1456119b54c7b6edea840ca16b40a97: You're the only colleague that I put the most effort on to train and making sure that you're doing great in your work. Hope that all my guidance and leadership keep you on track to excel further in both Grab and data engineering field. You're picking up new things very fast and I have seen your drastic improvement in terms of decisino making and troubleshooting issues. Do try out different things and all the best to go beyond your limit!
0aa751fdcd16ae43566956897f95e0ff75d3b402: Hey, though we didn't work much together but thanks for your time catching up with me. You're always the go-to person for any Digibank stuffs and I believe that you'll be the future leader of Digibank in the near future!
46f171a6d0205372174e2aacd2ebf79e95f7b053: You have a very cute and soft sound! In work, you're always very serious and attentive to details. It feels very trustable and easy working along with you.
d8f8780a49943a2caebe52d5ba79987271f50ba8: Very happy to have a chance to work more with you before I leave. You're very energitic and cheerful which will help the team to move further! Good luck working more on the Airflows and do not hesitate to ask me if you're not sure about anything even after I leave. I will charge your manager the bill!
8854d5c182e9c5f850dd246467243d0b8743e1d6: Hey, I am very happy with your new born baby and wish I have a chance to meet her one day. I was very eager to support and backup the works for both lending and GFG before I decided to move on. We didn't have much chance to work together but I believe there's still chance for me to learn from you one day in the future! Let's catchup anydays when you're back!
940e40bd272e9979d5a9c650c3a31d1a3d37f42c: Good luck to both you and myself on our uncertain future! You'll definitely be successful with your cheerful behaviour. You always bring joys to the team and I really like listening to you when you talk! I assure that everyone in team likes working and mingling around with you.
1c0f84898976612c246e1d30455b487ea37f63f4: First of all, don't work on late night! It's a bad habit that I picked up and I don't think that this is good (feeling guilty becaue I am typing this at 2am). You're very hardworking, techincally strong and willing to sacrifice your own time to build something for the team. I have many ideas but do not have the time to implement all of them, luckily you're were there to support and help to achieve many of the ideas together. The FEDW team will always be great with your support at the backend!
7fbc085ed6d646e50f1ee5f6b8e5229611e4580f: You're my role model since the day you joined Grab. I envy your composure and having a very sharp mind. You complement my lack of experience in the SWE field and lighten up my path to success in the SWE domain. Without your advices, I wouldn't be what I am today!
28895f4605920ceb70e27aa179f9f43ffc247cd6: My lunch buddy (because no one else I could find...) that talks to me everything else besides work! I learnt a lot of life and work experience from your advice. Besides that, you have a very high EQ and leadership experience which allows you to manage a team very well. You will be a very successful leader in Grab in the near future.
db40f17ed4011c335731bac7e402743e20fdfb94: You're very quite but sooooo steady in work. I also find that you're a very humourous person that seldom talks. Thanks for having 1 on 1 dinner with me and share me so many expert experience in the trading market. Love chatting with you and keep in touch!
a838203247c2f423844ace52c4db4c3ab6d66150: Congratz on your wedding! We have a relatively near birthday date if I remember correctly (February!). Thaks for your contribution to start off the AWS migration work and also helping me out when I was enjoying my life at Morocco. You're an expert working with cross functional team and keep it up!
786ed536adfa6c8b2a40b5e8a1cd33693d8eec31: Haha you sound very cute and young. I can feel the energy and happiness everytime you talk that brings joy to the team. You have very high potential in the data engineering field given that you're still so young. You will definitely learn a lot throughout the years in Grab!
c19043357bccd9bb9c59dbb627c9d3ff94bd58a0: You're one of the best and steady colleagues that finishes your work with 100% focus. I seldom (maybe never) see you did anything wrong because you're sooooo detailed in terms of testing and analyzing data. You're a very vocal person which is a positive attribute required in the team.
ee236b7c0eaeea72dcf38a6b0abc3790c7822289: You're very calm and good at talking to people. I admire your contribution at Grab throughout all the years. Thanks for helping out the GFG works during the migration and do help to take care of GFG members after my departure.
fe3000e28b6f1048ebf4c40b96e91d14e0b88065: You're one of the colleague that I put in most effort to train on. You're techincally strong and picking new things very fast. I saw your improvement and the willingness to learn and troublehoot issues yourself before reaching out to me. Do put in more time to design and architect the pipelines so that you're putting in all your effort on the correct direction! This takes time and experience to learn which you'll have to learn through reading how other's created their pipeline structures. All in all, I have confident that you'll be very successful and surpassing everyone in the team within a few years given your learning attitude that I've seen!
c43674a53daf002fd67e4d5ec205b6eff1674f8e: Not sure how many thanks I need to tell you because your support to me and the EDW team have been tremendous! You're always there for us and have full context on everything about Chimera. You're able to understand all our problems and ridiculous requests, just to give us an appropriate solution or advice. I have really learnt a lot from you and without you, I wouldn't be learning so much till date!
696bf29f323fa390ffb6fff80d91a8503acd326a: Thanks for the pictures! Do you know that your previous manager was my interviewer? Sadly that he wasn't here to see both of us being successful in Grab...
d9cf680b585c917ab93b37d08627a7f3818cca53: Thanks for always acknowledging our hardwork and giving credits to us. You've also supported us a lot during the days when the GFG team doesn't have a manager. I was so nervous in the early days without any context and you've always jumped in the support us with your expertise in GFG and FPNA.
19b478b76155d82ea5e51e967ca2d23e5074b0c0: You were one of my interim manager! Thanks for listening to my career aspiration and gave me the choice to enter data engineering. You explained the differences between data scientist/analyst/engineering and now I really like my job soooo much. Thanks to your advice and decision back then!
650745741f7cd2873cd4163ea72a3d095ff8f1f3: Hey, nothing much to say! You're both my enemy and friends. Thanks for bringing me into your team and the outings. You have a lot of funny personal stories which brings a lot of joy and fun to your team. Do keep in touch and meetup also even after my departure. Also thanks for bringing me into toastmaster which indeed was a very great experience! Your humorous and charming behaviour is sure to catch the attention of many girls.
bbc0c86368d51980b059195f7148a0cab91108d2: You're so energitic that you laugh on everything that we said. Let's hangout and drink more often so that you can share more of your secrets to us and everyone hehe! Didn't know that you have a yoga class which I would definitely join more often if I knew it earlier!
c038a7f69e7d6f26df44c37e4cab4de6d718c870: You're the first person I know from your team and we worked a lot together on GFG recon stuffs (headache man!). Thanks for introducing me to your team and hope you enjoy your time after marriage and do let me know when you have a kid!
d649794090980e5381ceed93ba7b2782f6ba3759: You're a very funny person that always gives a sudden lame joke. Didn't work much with you but know you more through outings with your team.
59bc9131c3c0f343d0c0851924b4a66d3155954a: Speak more and be crazy like us haha! Your presentation in toastmaster was awesome and I hope that I could do it like you in the future.
6d0d0b491d3a6a100d27e5430f0565811d8dda31: Thanks for supporting the GFG ADW team on the Azure platform with my ex manager. I didn't have much knowledge or context during that time and without you, things would break or gone unattended. Good luck with your career in Grab!
98deb36f91722f166cc08716c5bbb583819d5d07: Thanks for the invite to your house, that day was super amazing and fun. Envy that you have a karaoke facility room to sing anytime you want. au revoir!
b48aced0bc6c4023b8a4b3e801ac3eab3b994f8c: You looked young but sounded very mature. You have a lot of life experience that I have not encountered before. You're funny and gave us a lot of fun when we meet up. Good bye and good luck to your career at Grab.
de969301ae44e449cc38b62507a530e404446eda: Walao eh... your singing is soooo much better than mine. I thought that I have the loudest and strongest voice but I felt inferior infront of you. Love your energy and the playful spirit. Most importantly is that you won't get drunk even after soooo much drinking.
9a9f2d4d1f0b533212e22bdb052b150ea70aca70: Hi YoUNg boy! I really cannot guess your actual age until you told us. You're very on whenever there's an outing and I see you in almost all the pictures or events that the team is going to. The team will still need someone mature like you to take care of them hehe~
dfcec414265f8437403921927e8be827aa21e641: Hey man, you're one of my longest colleague. We worked together so much in the early days and thanks for guiding me and sharing me all the context that you have in GFG. You're very calm and have a clear thoughts when it comes to sharing an issue in the meeting. Glad that we manage to meet up once before I leave and I got to know you more since then!
8340f23ba0d951d9c13d534aa4ef9521452e11b6: Wow, congratz for your promotion. My impression on you is that you're always smiling no matter what. It brings in positive energy to everyone. Take care of the lending pipelines and continue with your positivity! Continue sharing more jokes with everyone!
4ae3014a82cfc2053f1967be7cba8be1795a498e: Thanks for being so inclusive and inviting me to the team's lunch session. You made me feel like I have more friends in work and I was very happy to join the lunch sessions with you guys. Very happy to know a bunch of playful colleagues at level 8! Stay pretty and young as always!
31d3ef0c755b725766f6f32cd9256f29f5434643: Remember meeting you once at the analytics social event. Thanks for helping out and giving contexts on the rewards pipeline for so many times. You're always dressed very well and looked happy all the time!
200776fba68cdc3179d04971ce1af80ae77743b1: I remember you as the event organizer in one of the analytics social event. You're charming and smiling to everyone that attended the event. Good luck to your career!
9a8c9bc7f810a9fcdc62247d60f13787d1227309: Hey my first pretty buddy in Grab! Thanks for your time having multiple sessions to onboard me to Grab and setting up all the required tools & accesses during my first month. Hope I did a great job helping you out in all the data queries and I believe the ADW team will be able to serve you better in the future also!
178751623f89eaae5c58fa5d2715b9187862e4c4: Only get to know you more in the second half of 2023. You're an expert in analytics and also very hardworking. Outside of work, I had a impression that you're very active and playful. You're pretty and have a great fashion sense. Wish you doing very well in your career(s) and personal life!
24477027be31895a66f25b6ffa58aa0df27910f3: Thanks for all your support in the early days when I was relatively new in both Grab and OVO. You shared me sooo many OVO context and helpout me to unblock so many business related issues. Love your calmness and sweet voice that is very encouraging to me and the team.
cc29b59c62a2d812a604d7de4dde131af44fe567: Thanks to your support on providing the correct OVO data. Without your support and context, we are not able to build a complete pipeline that we have today!
62a16d32686bc0f9df155fbccbda0cc2fb91eca0: Really thanks for giving me a chance to join Grab. Your voice is always sweet and charming. Thanks for onboarding me to Grab and helping me out in the early days. You had a very successful career in Grab!
b032535515c7921b3ca21cdecb6546a6cb10781e: You're the only one that I can called ex-ex-colleage and ex-colleague haha! Thanks for influencing me to join Grab and also great to see you progress well in Grab. I learnt a lot of data science stuff from you in the early days that brings me to what I am today!
ee990de6ebcf86744f9a76ecf0b822df9bb83fba: Your hair is super appealing!! Jiayou to be a successful `wang hong` and I will continue supporting your short videos! You're very cool and nice person!
865b77b850fde867ae5a18dbac7edfbdde0a0765: Boss, I admire your expertise and I learnt a lot from our technical discussion. Your knowledge and deep understanding in the data field is very important to everyone of us in analytics! Your dressing is also very special compared to others haha!
44a20442bf5662e531a81b5b3c4051a10a95bd90: Hi my neighbour! Still felt sorry that I accidentally spilled a glass of water that wets your pants that day. Hope that we still have chance to meet each other at the kopitiam! The analytics team under your leadership is growing so well!
a1a6b98afc37073e4b476ab2caec210314210206: Hi bro, we spoke only once or twice but I can feel that you're a very friendly person. Why? Because you're always smiling whenever we meet. It makes my day~
d7157cfecb0405b6b2bfa5bb6b4548f1094c1ddc: Thanks for reaching out to me and chitchat during the analytics social session! You're a very cool guy and happy to know you. You're learning very fast and able to pick up and build your own pipelines under the FEDW platform.
b56bb2bc3b15238514ffafcc575714f72ed1ef7b: Heard from soooo many people (mostly girls) that you're very handsome. I'm so envy about this man! You're very friendly whenever we're hanging out. au revoir!
1545be279000ccb0547de948b8b2436dd0c78c75: Hihi, long time no see! You're such a reliable colleague that helps to fix soooooooo many issues during the early days. I like how technical and serious you are when it comes to work. You will be very successful one day with such working attitude. Good luck and good bye~
b0f58a1c504ea3870be7de4ff15a38faab758cf2: Hope I helped and resolved most of your data queries. Do work closely with GFG ADW more often! Wish you a successful career ahead!
05def886678919c8fe0bd88988f8d93249ee3acb: Thanks for picking up and handling the troy pipelines! Your support was very important to us and hope that I was helpful to resolve most of your data queries and issues. Cheers~!
51d2e2487d6db081edce2386ec672504efa92b69: Happy to work with you and supporting all your data queries and questions. Keep it up with the good work and good luck to your career in Grab~
9783df04eb9f270ef93ecdffe56af3e25256d046: Very happy to have a chance to work with you on the merchant data. Also thanks for your 360 feedback which gave me a lot of insights to improve myself.
78af7225a3833b1e43018733974245f2c33be437: Happy to know you more in person during the toastmaster session. Stay pretty and healthy, and wish your kid be as successful as you're when she is grown up!
83e5e5b200fe1d20c9ac714ec6769fe83a2812af: Thankss so much for the given opportunity to work with AI modelling. I learned a lot not only from the project but also from your guidance and support. You gave me so much confidence and make me what I am today! Love your smile and calmness everytime.
50b3ef2cc65bd82c80071d6fb5d6d3edf386e809: Thank you for your support on all the slide and caspian platform issues. You're always very supportive and willing to answer my noob questions.
0ddb6612b7d667d6aceb14c6fd1ee1c9c3d102cb: Thank you for supporting us in the backend and also all the optimization works with delta tables. You're one of the important person who contributes towards EDW's success today.
aa59df4b8141d103a33b2bda613bc389576949c1: Thanks for your support on all the databricks and Azure connection related issues. I totally have no idea about any of these stuffs. You're always there to help us everytime to ensure our team can work smoothly.
265a42c90d7bb1ea523a30389c916e608380152d: Your expertise in Airflow contributes a lot to the stability and robustness of our Airflow platform. Appreciate all your hardwork and support to EDW.
e234e3fed69a16dcaa61b9d9b4514481476f1caa: I identify you as the Hubble girl! Your very responsive and willing to helpout whenever I have a noob question about Hubble. Thanks for all your support to enhance our Hubble CICD processes!
d6ae0b64f2521c8200b2f74a4d5aff05191e00f0: Goodluck to your future! Thanks for willing to spend time to chit chat before I leave Grab. I've learnt a lot from you during our meetup. In few years time, you will be a technical expert that would be leading a big team. Take care!
e9e42abeabf4ab73f132338ea40f99c578d833ae: Your contribution in Grab is remarkable! I realized that a lot of the features that we are using today have your footprint. Thanks a lot on the Hubble guidance and I really enjoyed working with you!
